solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int distributeCandies(int[] candies) {--newline--        Set<Integer> kinds = new HashSet<>();--newline--        for (int candy : candies) kinds.add(candy);--newline--        return kinds.size() >= candies.length / 2 ? candies.length / 2 : kinds.size();--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
